kpi_info.title: TRANSMITTED CODE POWER CLASS 9
kpi_info.use: The number of received Dedicated Measurement Reports received from the WBTS in which the Transmitted Code Power (TxCdPwr) value is inside Class 9 range. The mapping to power value depends on WCEL parameter PRACHDelayRange setting (5 km range): 36 dBm<=TxCdPwr; 10 km range: 38 dBm<=TxCdPwr; 20 km range: 40 dBm<=TxCdPwr; 60 km range: 42 dBm<=TxCdPwr; 180 km range: 44 dBm<=TxCdPwr. UPDATED: When an NBAP: DEDICATED MEASUREMENT REPORT message is received from the WBTS and the reported Transmitted Code Power value is inside Class 9 range.
